T02D3423:86a-1: padma na rte shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3423:86a-3: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3423:86a-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3423:86a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga 'dis sna tshogs padma
T02D3423:86a-6: dang zla ba la hr'i:yig dmar po yongs su gyur
T02D3423:86a-7: pa las padma gar gyi dbang phyug tu bdag nyid
T02D3423:86a-9: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3423:86a-12: sku mdog dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3423:86a-13: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3423:86a-14: g-yon phyogs su gos dkar mo dang snyoms par zhugs shing 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa /
T02D3423:86a-15: phyag yon na padma dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D3423:86a-16: gzhan phyag g-yas pa na gar gyi tshul gyis khab kyi phyag rgyas padma kha 'byed pa'o //
T02D3423:86a-17: de nas aom k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra sva
T02D3423:86a-18: bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pa'i sngags brjod par
T02D3423:86a-19: bya'o // de'i rjes su phyogs mtshams brgyad du lha mo brgyad bsam par bya'o//
T02D3423:86b-0: @86b de la padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i
T02D3423:86b-1: shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma dkar
T02D3423:86b-2: mo padma dmar po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3423:86b-3: lho'i 'dab ma la sgrol ma ljang gu padma ljang gu bsnams pa'o //
T02D3423:86b-4: nub kyi 'dab ma la dbang phyug ma ser mo 'khor lo dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D3423:86b-5: byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can dkar mo padma ser po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3423:86b-6: shar gyi mtshams kyi 'dab ma la padma'i gnas can
T02D3423:86b-7: ser mo btsod kyi kha dog lta bu'i padma bsnams
T02D3423:86b-8: pa'o // lho'i mtshams kyi 'dab ma la rdo rje
T02D3423:86b-9: padma'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i mdog lta bu padma
T02D3423:86b-11: nub kyi mtshams kyi 'dab ma la sna chogs padma dkar mo padma nag po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3423:86b-12: byang gi mtshams kyi 'dab ma la sna tshogs rdo rje ma kha dog sna tshogs padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D3423:86b-13: de rnams thams cad sems dpa'i skyil krung can phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3423:86b-15: ze'u 'bru'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das lta bu'o //
T02D3423:86b-16: de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3423:86b-17: aom hr'i:padma na rte shva ra h'um /
